## Objectives {style="font-size: 1.5em"}

:::{.incremental}
- As an end-user: learn how to leverage blockr to create __reproducible__ data __pipelines__ in minutes without writing any code.
- As a developer: learn how to __empower__ users to use blockr by developing new blockr and __deploying__ blockr applications.
:::
